document.full_text: the police do not need a warrant to enter a home if they smell burning marijuana, knock, announce themselves and hear what they think is evidence being destroyed, the supreme court ruled, 8 to 1.
document.title: search allowed if police hear evidence being destroyed
lines_and_colors: the police do not need a warrant to enter a home if they smell burning marijuana, knock, announce themselves and hear what they think is evidence being destroyed, the supreme court ruled, 8 to 1.
